How do you mean remount the cd? You want to eject it then reinsert?
I can tell you how to do something manually, but I'm not sure exactly what you want to do.
If you want to unmount a cd: umount /dev/CDDRIVE
If you want to mount a cd: mount /dev/CDDRIVE
replace CDDRIVE with the actual device name
You get it?
